---
title: Orthopedic Evaluation
---


Attempt to determine *Syndrome* before *pathology*

trying to figure out the patient's syndrome is easier than determining their pathology.
This will also help to focus on what is relevant *today* and focus less on the PMHx.


# Irritability

- Contractile (i.e. gluteal tendinopathy with GTPS)
- Non-contractile (i.e. bursitis with gtps)
